settings.caption: Hei rÄ“hitatanga me te Ratonga Mahi Whakamaroki, me whakarato koe i te Kaiwhakahaere Hononga Whaimana Hononga, Tau Tau Kiritaki, me te ingoa o te kaipupuri o te kaute, e whakaatuhia ana i runga i to tau korero tawhito. Mena kaore koe e mohio ki tetahi mea, me waea atu koe ki te 555-123-1234 mo te awhina.
